Keep get_klondike_dir, ensure_klondike_dir, load_features, save_features, load_progress, save_progress, load_config, regenerate_progress_md, update_quick_reference. Gotchas: Other modules may need to import from data.py, handle circular imports carefully. Dependencies: None - this is first.

features.description: Implement 'klondike serve' command with FastAPI server
acceptanceCriteria: Server starts on localhost with configurable port
Serves static React SPA from bundled assets
Auto-detection of .klondike folder or error if missing
evidenceLinks: Server starts successfully on configurable port
detects .klondike directory. Tested via background job with curl validation. All tests pass (181/181).
features.notes: Implementation: Use FastAPI with uvicorn for async/WebSocket support. Bundle React build in package static/ folder. Default port 8000, allow --port flag. Print clear URL message on start. Context: Foundation for all web UI features per WEB_PRD.md. Dependencies: React SPA build (F059). Gotchas: Ensure cross-platform compatibility (Windows/Mac/Linux), handle port-in-use errors gracefully.

features.description: React SPA scaffold with Tailwind CSS for serve UI
acceptanceCriteria: React SPA bootstrapped with Vite or CRA
Build output bundled into Python package
evidenceLinks: React SPA successfully scaffolded with Vite + TypeScript. Tailwind CSS v4 configured with @tailwindcss/postcss. React Router implemented with 4 main routes (Dashboard

ConfigEditor). Layout component with sidebar navigation using HeroIcons. WebSocket hook created for real-time updates. Vite build configured to output to Python package static directory. FastAPI serve command updated with client-side routing support. Verified working by starting server and viewing in browser.
features.notes: Implementation: Use Vite for fast builds. Structure: src/components for Dashboard, SpecExplorer, ActivityLog, ConfigEditor. Use HeroIcons for consistent iconography. Context: Frontend foundation per WEB_PRD.md UI Design section. Gotchas: Ensure build artifacts are included in Python package via pyproject.toml. Client-side routing needs server fallback to index.html.

features.description: Dashboard UI component with project overview
acceptanceCriteria: Shows progress bar or donut chart for feature completion
Shows feature counts by status with color-coded badges
Lists top 3 priority features as actionable items
evidenceLinks:
Implemented Dashboard UI component with all acceptance criteria:
- Displays project name (klondike-spec-cli) and version (0.2.18.dev24)
- Shows animated progress bar reflecting 68.4% completion
- Displays feature counts by status with color-coded cards (Total: 76

Blocked: 13)
- Shows current session status (Session #22 with focus)
- Lists priority features as actionable items with status badges
- Shows recent 5 git commits with hash

and message
- Real-time WebSocket connection indicator (green=connected)
- Fetches data from GET /api/status endpoint
- Auto-refreshes on WebSocket events (featureUpdated

etc.)
- CORS middleware configured to allow dev server connections
- Build completed successfully

all 181 tests pass
- Manual verification: API responds with 200

server running on localhost:8000
- React components render without errors in dev server
features.notes: Implementation: React component using Tailwind. Fetch data from GET /api/status. Use useEffect for WebSocket subscription. Consider recharts or similar for progress visualization. Context: Main landing view per WEB_PRD.md Dashboard section. Dependencies: F059, F060.

status

or notes (case-insensitive)

verification evidence (if verified)

all 181 tests passing

Dependencies: F059, F061.

features.description: Task Viewer UI component with feature details and editing
